product_title: Dr.Melaxin Peel Shot Glow Rice Peeling Ampoule

overall_perception_summary.headline: Viral Clinical Satisfaction
overall_perception_summary.description: Dr.Melaxin executes a textbook 'Viral Clinical' strategy, merging the credibility of a dermatologist brand with the visual drama of 'gommage' peeling. It validates its 'Glass Skin' promise not through poetry, but through the visceral, almost grotesque proof of 'Real Dead Skin' removal. It positions itself as the smart, authorized solution to a viral trend, bridging the gap between medical efficacy and TikTok entertainment.

foundation.title: The Corrective Authority
foundation.description: The brand anchors itself in The Healer territory, viewing skin issues like blackheads and dead cells as pathologies requiring intervention. It operates with Radical Transparency, using microscopic before/afters and 'real dead skin' visuals to prove high-performance efficacy. The positioning is Medical Authority, leveraging the 'Dr.' prefix to command trust in a crowded, trend-driven category.

identity.title: The Viral Doctor
identity.description: The personality is a hybrid Reliable Expert who went viral, balancing clinical data with '100M+ TikTok Views' hype. The Magician archetype dominates (60%), promising instant transformation via the 'Peel Shot' mechanism. Visually, it adheres to Pharma-Code—clinical whites, reds, and grids—to ground the viral energy in scientific rigor.

communication.title: Visceral Problem Solving
communication.description: The messaging is that of The Problem Solver, hooking the user with the result ('Glow') but persuading with the 'Real Dead Skin' visual proof. The USP is The Specialist, claiming ownership of the 'Peel Shot' niche for blackhead removal. It relies on Viral Results for validation, using the crowd's obsession (TikTok rank) as the ultimate proof of efficacy.

benefits.title: Corrective Social Currency
benefits.description: Functionally, it delivers Correction, physically removing imperfections to reveal perfection. Emotionally, it sells Intelligence—the feeling of being savvy enough to buy the 'authentic' viral hit (reinforced by counterfeit warnings). Socially, it is The Trend-Setter, offering a low-risk way to participate in a massive cultural skincare moment.

marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)
marker_1.reasoning: Despite using 'Rice' (nature), the brand frames itself as 'Dr.Melaxin'—a clinical entity solving pathologies. The mission is explicitly corrective: removing 'dead skin cells,' 'blackheads,' and 'impurities' to restore the skin, rather than just passively nourishing it. The 'Peel Shot' naming convention reinforces this interventionist stance.
marker_1.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... Peel Shot... Removes dead skin cells... blackhead remover... Improves Blackheads 178%

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (Derm-Validated) + Slider B (Restoration) clearly map to Territory 1. The focus is on fixing specific skin issues via a clinical (Doctor) framework.

marker_2.reasoning: The scope is hyper-focused on the micro-correction of pores and texture ('Pore Care,' 'Dead Skin'). Yet, with a $19.99 price point, Amazon availability, and 'TikTok Shop No.1' badges, it is aggressively democratic. It brings 'clinical' peeling to the mass market.
marker_2.evidence: $19.99... Daily Soft Exfoliating... TikTok Shop No.1 Beauty Best Seller... 100M+ TikTok Viral Views

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Micro-correction focus combined with mass/viral accessibility defines The Democratizer territory.

marker_3.reasoning: The brand prioritizes potency proof over mystique. It doesn't just say 'works'; it shows '178% improvement' and 'Real Dead Skin' clumps. The PDP is dense with percentages, microscopic before/afters, and ingredient breakdowns (AHA, BHA, PHA). It trades safety-softness for hard evidence of efficacy.
marker_3.evidence: Improves Blackheads 178%... 193% reduction sebum... Real Dead Skin... Excerpt from Dr. Melaxin Peel Shot Ampoule Clinical Test Report

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: High performance claims backed by intense data/evidence density (percentages, clinical reports) place this firmly in Radical Transparency.

marker_4.reasoning: Visually, it uses the codes of the pharmacy: white backgrounds, red text highlights, dropper bottles, and diagrammatic layouts. It positions itself as a 'Daily' clinical essential rather than a luxury item. Even the 'viral' elements are presented with a clinical gloss (badges, stats).
marker_4.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... Daily Soft Exfoliating... Clinical results show improvement... Clinical white background... Red emphasis text

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Clinical/Professional aesthetic combined with daily/accessible utility positioning aligns with The Medical Authority.

marker_5.reasoning: The voice is that of a specialist. It speaks in data points ('178%', 'AHA', 'BHA') and warnings ('Beware of counterfeit'). While it uses some hype ('100M Views'), the core demeanor is instructional and authoritative, prioritizing competence over emotional warmth.
marker_5.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... Clinical results show improvement... Beware of Counterfeit Products... Excerpt from Clinical Test Report

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Low warmth (data-focused) and high authority (Doctor/Clinical stance) creates The Reliable Expert personality.

marker_6.reasoning: The Magician leads because the promise is transformation: 'Peel Shot' and 'Real Dead Skin' coming off instantly implies a magical, immediate change. The Sage provides the backup via 'Dr.' branding and clinical percentages. The Everyman appears in the accessibility and 'TikTok #1' social proof.
marker_6.evidence: Transforms skin... Real Dead Skin... 178% improvement... Dr.Melaxin... TikTok Shop No.1

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Archetype mix determined by content analysis. Magician dominance aligns with the 'Peel/Transform' promise.

marker_7.reasoning: While the clinical text is professional, the overlaying 'shout' of the brand is Hype. '100M+ TikTok Viral Views', 'No.1 Beauty Best Seller', and 'BEWARE OF COUNTERFEIT PRODUCTS!' (caps lock included) create a high-energy, hype-driven broadcast frequency that overrides the quieter clinical descriptors.
marker_7.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... BEWARE OF COUNTERFEIT PRODUCTS!... No.1 in TikTok Shop... REAL DEAD SKIN

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Extreme enthusiasm (5/5) via viral stats and caps-lock warnings pushes this into Territory 4 (Hype Beast) despite the clinical subject matter.

marker_8.reasoning: The visual language is derived from the lab: white backgrounds, grid layouts, microscopic circles, and bold red/black typography. It uses the aesthetics of data to signal efficacy. Even the 'natural' rice elements are presented in sterile, glass-like containers or as ingredients on a clean surface.
marker_8.evidence: Clinical white background... Microscopic skin imaging... Red bold blocks... Before-and-After grid layout
marker_8.look_and_feel: Clinical rigor meets viral urgency; a lab report designed for a TikTok feed.
marker_8.primary_palette: Clinical white and black base with aggressive red accents for data emphasis.

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Cool temperature and structured, data-heavy layout firmly align with Pharma-Code territory.

marker_9.reasoning: The hook is the result: 'Glow,' 'Remove Dead Skin,' 'Clear Skin.' The persuasion is rational: 'It works by targeting and drawing out only the impurities... 178% improvement.' It identifies a problem (dead skin/blackheads) and offers a logical, clinically-backed solution.
marker_9.evidence: Removes dead skin cells... blackheads... visibly brighter... Clinical results show improvement... Improves Blackheads 178%

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Result-focused hook combined with rational/data-driven persuasion defines The Problem Solver.

marker_10.reasoning: The protagonist is 'Dr.Melaxin'—a faceless clinical authority. The setting is the lab, evidenced by the 'Ampoule' format, microscopic imagery, and 'Clinical Test Reports.' Even though rice is an ingredient, the narrative isn't about the farm; it's about the extraction and formulation in a scientific context.
marker_10.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... Clinical Test Report... Ampoule... Microscopic skin imaging

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Clinical protagonist + Lab setting aligns perfectly with Territory 1.

marker_11.reasoning: While the brand uses clinical data, the loudest validation comes from '100M+ TikTok Views' and '#1 Best Seller' badges—the fans. The ultimate proof is visual: the 'Real Dead Skin' photos and the microscopic before/afters. It relies on the 'seeing is believing' viral mechanic.
marker_11.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... No.1 Beauty Best Seller... Before/After... Real Dead Skin

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Validation by Fans/Viral stats combined with Visual proof (Before/Afters) defines Territory 3.

marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)
marker_12.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Problem Solver (Targets specific skin concern)
marker_12.reasoning: The brand claims ownership of a specific solution: 'Peel Shot' using 'Black Rice'. It is not a generalist moisturizer; it is a specialist 'Blackhead Remover' and 'Exfoliator'. The narrow focus on 'Peeling' and 'Dead Skin' creates a Specialist positioning.
marker_12.evidence: Peel Shot... Blackhead Remover... Exfoliating Black Rice Ampoule... Real Dead Skin

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Ingredient/Format ownership (Rice Peel) combined with a Problem Solver/Niche scope maps to The Specialist.

marker_13.reasoning: The PDP is heavily invested in explaining *how* it works (distinguishing 'real dead skin' from product clumps) and proving *that* it works (microscopic imagery). It prioritizes mechanism education and evidentiary proof over lifestyle aesthetics.
marker_13.evidence: This is pushed-out real dead skin, not a phenomenon of the product clumping... Microscopic skin imaging... How to use

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Explainer depth + Evidence intent aligns with Science Education.

marker_14.reasoning: The product is a 'Fixer'—it physically removes dead skin and blackheads. The goal is an Aesthetic transformation: 'Glow,' 'Radiant,' 'Clear.' It is about correcting the skin's texture to achieve a perfected look.
marker_14.evidence: Removes dead skin cells... blackhead remover... Radiant Skin... Improves Blackheads 178%

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: High fixing action (Peeling) + Aesthetic goal (Glow) maps to Correction.

marker_15.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Savvy (I feel smart/validated for choosing this)
marker_15.reasoning: The 'Beware of Counterfeit' warnings and 'TikTok #1' badges appeal to a Savvy consumer who wants the *real* viral hit. The clinical data offers Reassurance that the hype is justified. The payoff is feeling smart for buying the authentic, effective solution everyone is talking about.
marker_15.evidence: BEWARE OF COUNTERFEIT PRODUCTS... Only purchase from Dr.Melaxin_Official... TikTok Shop No.1

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Reassurance (Authenticity/Clinical) + Savvy (Viral Status) aligns with Intelligence territory.

marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Smart Choice (because it makes sense)
marker_16.reasoning: Buying this is a signal of keeping up with trends ('TikTok Viral'). It's also a Smart Choice because it's backed by 'Dr.' credibility. The consumer joins the tribe of people who know what the 'No.1 Beauty Best Seller' is.
marker_16.evidence: TikTok Shop No.1 Beauty Best Seller... 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... Cardi B's Pick

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Rational/Smart motivation + Trending tribal position aligns with The Trend-Setter.

marker_17.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Acceptance (I want to be accepted by the group)
marker_17.reasoning: The massive social proof ('100M views', '#1 Best Seller') makes this The Safe Choice. It signals that 'everyone else is doing it, so it must be good.' The explicit warnings about counterfeits reinforce that this is the 'correct' version of the majority choice.
marker_17.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... No.1 Beauty Best Seller... Beware of Counterfeit

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Acceptance vector + Majority dynamic aligns with The Safe Choice.
